format: A data frame with 1129 observations on the following 28 variables.
title: Vehicle info from the EPA for 2012
reference: Fueleconomy.gov, Shared MPG Estimates: Toyota Prius 2012.

parameters.guzzler: Whether the car is considered a "guzzler" or not, a factor with levels N and Y.
parameters.drive_sys: Drive system, a factor with levels.
parameters.trans_creeper_gear: A factor with level N only.
parameters.fuel_cell: Whether the car has a fuel cell or not, a factor with levels N, Y.
parameters.trans_lockup: Whether transmission locks up, a factor with levels N and Y.
parameters.fuel_usage: Fuel usage, a factor with levels.
parameters.car_truck: Car or truck, a factor with levels car, 1, 2.
